---
title: "Political Science 270: Understanding Political Numbers"
date: "2016-05-05T21:48:51-07:00"
---

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
library("tidyverse")
library("here")
library("knitr") 

read_csv(here("static", "270", "ps-270-excel.csv")) %>%
  select(-week) %>%
  mutate(Reading = "",
         Slides = "",
         Due = ifelse(is.na(Due), "", Due),
         Date = str_replace(Date, "Mon", "M"),
         Date = str_replace(Date, "Wed", "W"),
         Date = str_replace(Date, "February", "Feb"),
         Date = str_replace(Date, "January", "Jan")) %>%
  kable() %>%
  print()
```
